mapper.select: select from TGRID_PERSON ORDER by PERSON_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TGRID_PERSON ORDER by PERSON_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(PERSON_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(PERSON_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TGRID_PERSON

select * from TGRID_PERSON where PERSON_ORDER_NUM = (select max(PERSON_ORDER_NUM) from TGRID_PERSON where PERSON_ORDER_NUM<(select PERSON_ORDER_NUM from TGRID_PERSON where PERSON_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TGRID_PERSON where PERSON_ORDER_NUM = (select min(PERSON_ORDER_NUM) from TGRID_PERSON where PERSON_ORDER_NUM>(select PERSON_ORDER_NUM from TGRID_PERSON where PERSON_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select from TGRID_PERSON where PERSON_FAMILY_ID=#{familyId} ORDER by PERSON_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TGRID_PERSON where PERSON_HOUSE_ID=#{houseId} ORDER by PERSON_FAMILY_ID, PERSON_RELATIONSHIP asc
